sections.title: Full Stack Developer
sections.description: Worked principally with React-Native, ReactJS and AWS. And worked in small tasks with Swift.

sections.title: University of Padua - Data Science
sections.description: I am currently a student and i miss the last 3 exams.

sections.title: Commercial services
sections.description: Commercial vocational institute Carlo Rosselli, Castelfranco Veneto (Italy).

sections.title: Programming
sections.description: I love programming, thinking and using my mind to create more and more magic, clean and especially performed code. I like working with innovative technologies, mainly with web and mobile application. Currently i use a lot React and React-Native.

sections.title: Vegetable garden and aquariums
sections.description: These two passions of mine allow me to get my hands dirty, free my mind and appreciate how much nature can give us.

sections.title: {Codemotion} Rome
sections.description: (Partecipated) Codemotion is the biggest tech conference in Italy and one of the most important in Europe.

sections.title: {Codemotion} Milan
sections.description: (Partecipated) Codemotion is the biggest tech conference in Italy and one of the most important in Europe.

sections.title: Hackathon
sections.description: First prize winning with a web application developed with the use of the React library and the Google Maps API.

sections.title: University project
sections.description: Implementation of a university project using the following NodeJS, MongoDB and ReactJS technologies. Mainly I worked in front end with the React library.

sections.title: University project
sections.description: Realization of a project on voluntary request for the Mobile Programming and Multimedia course, which allowed me to create a mobile application developed with the React Native framework.

more.title: DevFest Veneto - GDG Venice
more.description: I partecipated to the DevFest organized by Google Developers Group Venice.

more.title: Coding Gym - Programmers in Padua
more.description: I partecipated to some "4-5" Coding Gym. Coding Gym is an international format of programming laboratories open to any language and developed for continuous improvement.

more.title: Talks - Programmers in Padua
more.description: I partecipated to some talks. Programmers in Padua is a little community, who work and passionate about programming, new technologies and startups. We meet once a month in an open and informal environment, where the participants propose themselves for the talks.
